attributes.action: Review in favour of "Children" the Human Rights Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of another murder of an innocent baby because of the fear of upsetting someone's human rights. The PM must urgentky review the bureacracy behind the incapabilities of the social services. Melinda & Denise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
